title: Juiceheads
itunes:title: Juiceheads
description:
What's up with the juice cleanse trend? Cristen and Caroline sip on how Scientology helped reintroduce juice cleansing to the masses and why the promise of detoxing is fresh-squeezed quackery.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
